# chirimoya-navigation-item

This is a `full width` button by default, you can change that behavior by setting `display: inline-flex` into the host (`chirimoya-navigation-item`).

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute      | Description                                   | Type                                | Default      |
| -------------- | -------------- | --------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------- | ------------ |
| `alignContent` | `aligncontent` | alignment of the children elements            | `"center" \| "left" \| "right"`     | `'left'`     |
| `href`         | `href`         | href property for anchor tags                 | `string`                            | `undefined`  |
| `isDisabled`   | `isdisabled`   | indicates the disabled status                 | `boolean`                           | `false`      |
| `isSelected`   | `isselected`   | indicates weather the item is selected or not | `boolean`                           | `false`      |
| `navRole`      | `navrole`      | role of the navigation item                   | `"normal" \| "primary"`             | `'normal'`   |
| `variant`      | `variant`      | variant of navigation item                    | `"bordered" \| "inline" \| "label"` | `'bordered'` |
